features_t Struct Reference

#include <dr_proc.h>


Data Fields

uint flags_edx
uint flags_ecx
uint ext_flags_edx
uint ext_flags_ecx

Detailed Description

Struct to hold all 4 32-bit feature values returned by cpuid. Used by proc_get_all_feature_bits().
